value.string: HTTP_CACHE_CONTROL:no-cache HTTP_CONNECTION:Keep-Alive HTTP_CONTENT_LENGTH:117 HTTP_CONTENT_TYPE:application/x-www-form-urlencoded HTTP_ACCEPT:text/html, application/xhtml+xml, image/jxr, */* HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING:gzip, deflate HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE:en-US,en;q=0.5 HTTP_HOST:localhost:63155 HTTP_REFERER:http://localhost:63155/account/register HTTP_USER_AGENT:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/48.0.2564.82 Safari/537.36 Edge/14.14332
